mapper.insert: insert into patient(p_name, p_no, p_addr, p_phone, p_visit,p_chart) values(#{p_name},#{p_no},#{p_addr}, #{p_phone}, "F", #{p_chart});

insert into schedule(s_type, s_date, s_startTime, s_endTime, s_memo, s_patient,s_patientIdNum, s_doctor) values("OC", #{s_date}, #{s_startTime}, #{s_endTime}, #{s_memo}, #{s_patient},#{s_patientIdNum}, #{s_doctor});
